properties.areaDesc: Charleston Harbor; Coastal waters from Savannah GA to Altamaha Sound GA out 20 nm ...including Grays Reef National Marine Sanctuary
properties.headline: Marine Weather Statement issued January 24 at 12:52AM EST by NWS Charleston SC
properties.description:
Areas of fog will impact portions of the Altamaha Sound and the
adjacent waterways through 4 AM. Visibilities as low as 1 NM could
occur. Conditions are expected to improve after 4 AM as northeast
winds begin to turn more easterly.
properties.instruction:
Mariners are urged to navigate with extreme care. If you must
navigate in these conditions, proceed with caution. Use proper
fog signals, including fog horns. Make sure all navigational
running lights are on.

NWSheadline: FOG POSSIBLE IN THE ALTAMAHA SOUND AND ADJACENT WATERWAYS
